paragraph: Contact us now to schedule a consultation.

detailsData.title: Experienced Attorneys
detailsData.content: Our attorneys average over thirty years of experience, providing clients with top-notch legal representation.

detailsData.title: Client-Centered Approach
detailsData.content: We take a flexible approach to legal issues, tailoring solutions to meet the needs of businesses and individuals.

detailsData.title: Innovative Fee Arrangements
detailsData.content: We offer cost-effective legal solutions with fee arrangements that benefit our clients' bottom lines.

address: 333 W. Santa Clara St., Ste. 910, San Jose, CA 95113
subHeading: Accomplished San Jose Attorneys With a Proven Track Record
valueProp: Terra Law LLP focuses on implementing solutions that achieve the strategic legal and business goals of its clients in practice areas including litigation, real estate, creditor’s rights, and bankruptcy. Terra Law is a unique law firm offering the highest quality legal services to the real estate, financial and business communities.
openHours: Hours may vary, contact for details
